errors.BadRequestException: Bad request. Please check your data.
errors.NotFoundException: The requested resource was not found.
errors.ForbiddenException: Access to the requested resource is forbidden.
errors.NotAcceptableException: The requested resource is not acceptable.
errors.RequestTimeoutException: Request timeout. Please try again later.
errors.ConflictException: Conflict detected. Please resolve the conflict and try again.
errors.GoneException: The resource you requested is no longer available.
errors.HttpVersionNotSupportedException: HTTP version not supported. Please use a supported version.
errors.PayloadTooLargeException: Payload too large. Please reduce the size of your request.
errors.UnsupportedMediaTypeException: Unsupported media type. Please use a supported media format.
errors.UnprocessableEntityException: Unprocessable entity. Please check your submission for errors.
errors.InternalServerErrorException: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.NotImplementedException: This functionality has not been implemented.
errors.ImATeapotException: I'm a teapot. The server refuses to brew coffee because it is a teapot.
errors.MethodNotAllowedException: Method not allowed. Please check the request method.
errors.BadGatewayException: Bad gateway. An error occurred while contacting the upstream server.
errors.ServiceUnavailableException: Service unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.GatewayTimeoutException: Gateway timeout. The request timed out while waiting for a response from the upstream server.
errors.PreconditionFailedException: Precondition failed. One or more conditions of the request header fields evaluated to false.
